Method Detail

addPublic

public static boolean addPublic(int id,
                                java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.String type,
                                java.lang.String description)
Add an exposed log entry. This is accessible via the web interface

Parameters:
id - The id of the bpel process the log is for
name - The name of the operation to insert
type - The type of the operation to insert
Returns:
true if added to the log, false otherwise

retrievePublic

public static java.lang.String retrievePublic(int id)
Retrieve exposed log entries

Parameters:
id - The id of the bpel process to retrieve the log for
Returns:
String containing the entries
